WRITING.TEXT:
Go to the Punch House. Best bar in Chicago for the price. It's in the basement of Talia Hall, get some tickets to see a band while you're there. Usually around 30 bucks for a show and it's a nice place.
The Punch house will get you drunk...it's good at that
I would t be worried but get the testing anyways. And I love you too lol
Happened to an ex, we went to the hospital together. Seems he was just allergic to my spunk.

They make my tummy get into knots :)
I love em

This isn't cheating, but you two really need to sit down and talk out your ground rules. Don't let something that bothers you slide because you're afraid it'll ruin the relationship, if you do the. The thing will come back and ruin it for sure.
Communication is the most important thing
I was with an Irish guy from Chicago named Danny for a while. He ended up ghosting me so don't take my advice lol

I do enjoy the attention I get from it. I looked bad for a long time and I worked hard to look the way I do now. There is still a lot of work I have to do to get myself where I want to be, but it's nice too see people's reactions when they see where I started from.
I hope you get where you want to be in life, sorry from my snarky response earlier.
A lot of it has to deal with attitude...I'd start there if I were you :)
I hope that's a good thing lol

Thanks xD

Something like this happened to me.
I went on Facebook and tagged my family and said "someone got ahold of my private (aka sexy) videos. They are threatening to show it to family...I don't think you'd be interested so this is just a fair warning...if you are interested then we have bigger issues than this lol Sorry for the inconvenience, I vote we pretend it didn't happen and talk about this never."

I'm bi and an ex would beg me to get a girl to sleep with him whenever we were drunk. I did it one night. He cried into one of my best friends vaginas...
...I have a really nice voice. I can't help it...but it only happens on recordings

The cheapest Walmart pomade. After a shower with your hair mostly dry put about a dunes worth of pomade on your hand and rub that into your fingers then all your hair. Put the bangs down with the comb then comb straight up and back from the forehead.
Ps here are pics of me before I knew how to style myself and some from after. http://i.imgur.com/yKyH8XM.jpg http://i.imgur.com/ZKkIIOx.jpg http://i.imgur.com/C4QIL06.jpg http://i.imgur.com/LfGMNIa.jpg

Grow your beard out a bit and trim it up like mine. Trust me it will look way better and help frame your face. Keep it at a guard length two. Put a bit of product in your hair and move it up. I know you feel like you should be covering the forehead more to hide the balding but we can tell that's what your doing, so instead of hiding it use it as part of the look. You want to create volume with your hair now. Try pomade and if that doesn't work then moose. http://i.imgur.com/hHr2ZXE.jpg
You look like someone I'd come up to and say "are you into guys because you're super cute and I'm hoping to get to know you"

It did

Yeah. She isn't religious, comes from a somewhat conservative family but never really shows it. She is college educated and has 3 sons/ 3 daughters. Two of my sisters came out as bi a few years ago and she was fine with it...not so much with me lol

My mom had no idea and my coming out didn't go very well, but at the end of the day she is still my mother and I love her. If you are having a really though time then send her a text saying "I'm gay" send it to her while you're near by so you two can talk about it if you want
